name: Knights of the Night
description:
Development update

So far all that is available for the game is the main menu introductory cutscene. I plan to keep updating once major features are added and make the game paid once I feel that it has enough features. For now you can enjoy this little demo for free.

The Premise

Explore an Open World filled with magic, life, death, and mystery. Battle strange beasts in an effort to protect the civilized world from descending into barbaric savagery.

The Controls

To move around use the standard WASD keys, use the mouse to move around, and note that player movement is relative to camera rotation.

Pickup weapons by walking over them. In order to alternate between them use the R and F keys. To use a weapon left click on your mouse

To Reset your health press Q. If you prefer to die press E.
